body_html:
@jart Tensorflow is such a great framework! I can always get help quickly whenever facing problem:)
There are adequate documentations, but still the more the better.
For me currently focusing on dynamic seq2seq, as I have filed in another bug, I find it's hard to read seq2seq code.
It would be great to see more example code showing the usage of context state and dynamic seq2seq with beam search.
Also might need more documents on TensorArray.

body:
@jart Tensorflow is such a great framework! I can always get help quickly whenever facing problem:)
There are adequate documentations, but still the more the better.
For me currently focusing on dynamic seq2seq, as I have filed in another bug, I find it's hard to read seq2seq code. 
It would be great to see more example code showing the usage of context state and dynamic seq2seq with beam search. 
Also might need more documents on TensorArray.
